Reidemeister 1 Move¶

This section documents tests for the R1 move functionality.

Reidemeister 1

Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r1_1():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x1[1], x1[3] = x1[2], x1[0]
 8
 9    e0, e1 = Edge(0), Edge(1)
10
11    e0[0], e0[1] = x1[0], x1[3]
12    e1[0], e1[1] = x1[2], x1[1]
13
14    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, e0, e1])
15
16    yp_before_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
17
18    assert yp_before_r1 == yp_ground_truth
Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r1_2():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x1[1], x1[3] = x1[2], x1[0]
 8
 9    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1])
10
11    yp_before_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
12
13    assert yp_before_r1 == yp_ground_truth
14
15    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
16
17    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 1
18    assert 'x1' in r1_crossing_labels
19
20    sgd = apply_r1(sgd, 'x1')
21
22    yp_after_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
23
24    assert yp_after_r1 == yp_ground_truth
Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r1_3():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x2 = Crossing('x2')
 8
 9    e1, e2, e3, e4 = Edge(1), Edge(2), Edge(3), Edge(4)
10
11    x2[3] = e1[0]
12    x2[0] = e1[1]
13    x2[1] = e2[0]
14    x2[2] = e4[1]
15
16    x1[2] = e2[1]
17    x1[1] = e4[0]
18    x1[0] = e3[1]
19    x1[3] = e3[0]
20
21    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, x2, e1, e2, e3, e4])
22
23    yp_before_r1s = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
24
25    assert yp_before_r1s == yp_ground_truth
26
27    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
28
29    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 2
30    assert 'x1' in r1_crossing_labels and 'x2' in r1_crossing_labels
31
32    sgd = apply_r1(sgd, 'x1')
33
34    yp_after_first_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
35
36    assert yp_after_first_r1 == yp_ground_truth
37
38    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
39
40    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 1
41    assert 'x2' in r1_crossing_labels
42
43    sgd = apply_r1(sgd, 'x2')
44
45    yp_after_second_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
46
47    assert yp_after_second_r1 == yp_ground_truth
48
49    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
50
51    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 0
Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r1_4():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x2 = Crossing('x2')
 8
 9    e1, e2, e3, e4 = Edge(1), Edge(2), Edge(3), Edge(4)
10
11    x2[3] = e4[1]
12    x2[0] = e1[0]
13    x2[1] = e1[1]
14    x2[2] = e2[0]
15
16    x1[2] = e2[1]
17    x1[1] = e4[0]
18    x1[0] = e3[1]
19    x1[3] = e3[0]
20
21    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, x2, e1, e2, e3, e4])
22
23    yp_before_r1s = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
24
25    assert yp_before_r1s == yp_ground_truth
26
27    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
28
29    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 2
30    assert 'x1' in r1_crossing_labels and 'x2' in r1_crossing_labels
31
32    sgd = apply_r1(sgd, 'x1')
33
34    yp_after_first_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
35
36    assert yp_after_first_r1 == yp_ground_truth
37
38    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
39
40    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 1
41    assert 'x2' in r1_crossing_labels
42
43    sgd = apply_r1(sgd, 'x2')
44
45    yp_after_second_r1 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
46
47    assert yp_after_second_r1 == yp_ground_truth
48
49    r1_crossing_labels = has_r1(sgd)
50
51    assert len(r1_crossing_labels) == 0

yamada
